com.microsoft.azure.storage.RetryContext

  • Packages that use RetryContext 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.storage
    This package contains the storage service base classes.

    • Uses of RetryContext in com.microsoft.azure.storage

      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.storage that return RetryContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RetryContext RetryingEvent.getRetryContext​()
      Gets the context for a retry of a request made against the storage services.
      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.storage with parameters of type RetryContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RetryInfo RetryExponentialRetry.evaluate​(RetryContext retryContext, OperationContext operationContext)
      Determines whether the operation should be retried and specifies the interval until the next retry.
      RetryInfo RetryLinearRetry.evaluate​(RetryContext retryContext, OperationContext operationContext)
      Determines whether the operation should be retried and specifies the interval until the next retry.
      RetryInfo RetryNoRetry.evaluate​(RetryContext retryContext, OperationContext operationContext)
      Determines whether the operation should be retried and specifies the interval until the next retry.
      abstract RetryInfo RetryPolicy.evaluate​(RetryContext retryContext, OperationContext operationContext)
      Determines whether the operation should be retried and specifies the interval until the next retry.
      protected boolean RetryPolicy.evaluateLastAttemptAndSecondaryNotFound​(RetryContext retryContext)
      Determines the time of the last attempt to a storage location and returns a boolean that specifies if a request that was sent to the secondary location failed with 404.
      protected RetryInfo RetryPolicy.evaluateRetryInfo​(RetryContext retryContext, boolean secondaryNotFound, long retryInterval)
      Determines the RetryInfo object that indicates whether the next retry will happen in the primary or secondary location, and specifies the location mode.
      Constructors in com.microsoft.azure.storage with parameters of type RetryContext 
      Constructor Description

      RetryingEvent​(OperationContext opContext, java.lang.Object connectionObject, RequestResult requestResult, RetryContext retryContext)
      Creates an instance of the BaseEvent class which is fired when a request is retried.
